title: Introduction to Telemarketing and Sales Training
headline: This free online course provides telemarketing strategies designed to get commitment from customers and increase sales.
description: The systematic use of the telephone is one of the fastest-growing sales and marketing strategies used today. Magazines, memberships, electricity, gas and many more products and services are regularly sold over the phone. This foundational sales training course focuses on strategies that boost your telemarketing and telesales skills. We explain how to overcome objections raised by reluctant potential customers to make successful sales calls.
courseDescription:
In today's market, managers are tasked with improving sales performance by training staff to improve their skills. Whether they possess the ‘power of persuasion’, the ‘capacity to convince’ or the ‘wit to win over’, dynamite salespeople are not born with the traits required to succeed. They possess the commitment, discipline and drive to learn the best ways to build relationships with their prospective customers. Telemarketing is very different to face-to-face sales and making sales pitches over the phone demands different skills so this sales training course provides the specific proven techniques your team needs to get more customers to buy your products and services.

We discuss the top strategies used by telemarketing and telesales professionals to get commitments from potential customers. Our first topic examines the definition, process, types and benefits of telemarketing. We then explain how to increase sales made over the phone by gearing up for winning calls, overcoming sales aversion and making the most of your time.

The course identifies the four probabilities of success that can help you achieve measurable business results. We highlight the top ten words and phrases to use during sales-related interactions. Most prospects will judge your intelligence, professionalism and knowledge in the first seven seconds so we show you how to include six key components in your seven-second opening statement and how to deal with objections and rejections. Sign up for this telemarketing and telesales training course to pick up key skills that you can use to close deals over the phone.
